name: Legends in the Lores
startIntroPart1: Oh my, why is this poor human wandering around? He dosen't have a place for him?
startIntroPart2: He is different, different from all of them. As time flies, he will be the strongest ever existed.
startIntroPart3: Is that so? well, we will see about that.
declaringWar: Come on, give me some surprises!
attacked: You will fall, just like others.
defeated: I guess you won, even with my last strength...
neutralYes: You have a lucky day, huh?
